articles.author: Carin Smith
articles.title: European investor buys SA wine estate from French Cointreau family member - News24
articles.description: The historic Morgenhof wine estate near Stellenbosch was auctioned off on Wednesday.
articles.content:
• The historic Morgenhof wine estate near Stellenbosch was auctioned off on Wednesday.
  • It was bought by a European buyer for R52.25 million.
  • The current owner is a member of the… [+2109 chars]
